description: For door to door salesman Dacotah Red, today is his lucky day in the suburbs. Desperately needing a sale, he thinks he's hit the jackpot when homeowner Gunner invites him around back to discuss his product, but it turns out, Gunner's not really interested in Dacotah's solar panels, though there is something Dacotah can tempt him with. Gunner lays it out for him: if Dacotah wants the sale, he'll have to give up the ass. Dacotah considers the offer and decides that he can live with the terms that Gunner has set. With both guys agreeing to the deal, Dacotah sets in on Gunner's dick, showing just how hard of a worker he is. Gunner grows rock hard inside Dacotah's mouth, but he's not paying to get blown. What Gunner wants is to get fucked by Dacotah's meaty pole, and Dacotah obliges him, fucking Gunner's closeted hole all over the bed as Gunner soaks up every second of it. By the time he shoots his load, Gunner is more than satisfied with the deal he's made. For Dacotah, cumming all over Gunner is just an added bonus to an already fruitful day. Enjoy!
title: Solar Pounder
